text: Rashiram Debbarma was an Indian politician. He was elected as MLA of Mandaibazar Vidhan Sabha Constituency in Tripura Legislative Assembly in 1977, 1983, 1988 and 1993. He died on 5 August 2019. ==References== Category:2019 deaths Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians Category:Members of the Tripura Legislative Assembly Category:Tripuri people
title: Rashiram Debbarma
